q1: How many teams can qualify for the World Cup?
a1: 32 teams qualify at the start with the host country automatically qualifying.
q2: No team, talk about any subject
a2: Is that why it's competitive to host?
q3: Not really, there are other factor why it's competitive to host.
q4: Facilities, infrastructure and the size of the bid
a4: How big is the average bid for the World Cup?
q5: I think one just has to apply and comply with whatever FIFA asks you to, including giving them presents and money.
a5: I believe it should be pretty easy, the host country always benefits.
